title: Foundation: A/L in Physical Science
description: A strong foundation in advanced mathematics is non-negotiable for AI/ML. Excel in the G.C.E. A/L Physical Science (Maths) stream, focusing on Combined Mathematics.
qualifications: G.C.E. A/L (Maths Stream) with high marks

title: Bachelor's Degree in CS/SE or Statistics
description: Obtain a degree with a strong quantitative and programming focus. Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Statistics are ideal. Take university-level courses in Data Structures, Algorithms, and Linear Algebra.

title: Specialization & Learning ML Frameworks
description: Start specializing in Machine Learning. This can be done through a Master's degree or through rigorous self-study and online courses. Gain hands-on experience with core ML frameworks.
qualifications: Portfolio of ML projects on GitHub

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Work as an ML Engineer, where you will be responsible for designing, building, and deploying machine learning models into production systems. This role bridges the gap between data science and software engineering.

title: Senior ML Engineer / AI Researcher
description: Advance to a senior role where you architect complex AI systems, lead ML projects, and mentor other engineers. Alternatively, you can move into a research-focused role, developing novel algorithms and pushing the boundaries of AI. A PhD is often required for pure research roles.
institutes: Leading tech companies with R&D departments
